rules.name: Changed
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR (11 AND 12)

Flow.description: - Sends a Platform Event to Grace if Postal Code is changed to receive the territory of the record and deletes all associated Project Territories in case any existing - Sends a notification to the Project Team and Owner of the record if changes are made to history tracking fields - Creates Project Team Members for new Potentials

formulas.name: NotificationBodyGerman
formulas.expression: {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.FirstName}+' '+{!$Record.LastModifiedBy.LastName}+' hat Änderungen an dem Projekt '+{!$Record.Name}+ ' vorgenommen!'

Flow.label: Project After Update Flow
